meta_title: Overhaul Definition: The Strategic Difference vs. Repair
meta_description: What is an overhaul? It’s more than a repair—it’s a lifecycle reset. Learn the industrial overhaul definition, TBO strategies, and CapEx implications.
title: Overhaul Definition: Why It’s Not Just a "Big Repair" (And How to Execute It)

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Overhaul Definition: Why It’s Not Just a "Big Repair" (And How to Execute It)

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a clean, high-tech industrial maintenance workshop. In the center, a large, complex industrial turbine or engine is being disassembled by a diverse team of three technicians. They are wearing modern safety gear: hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One technician is inspecting a large metal component with a digital caliper, another is referencing a tablet (back of device visible only), and the third is organizing parts on a clean layout table. The lighting is bright and cool, emphasizing precision and cleanliness. In the background, blurred industrial shelving and yellow safety markings are visible. No text or words in the image.
